src_original: namaḥ saptānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhakoṭīnāṃ namo maitreyapramukhānāṃ sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānām /  namaḥ samyakpratipannānām /  namo devarṣīṇām /
namo devabrahmaṇe /  namo buddhāya /  namo bhagavate rudrāya umāpatisahitāya /  namo varuṇāya /  namo bhagavate nārāyaṇāya /

adhimuktikakaśmīramahāśmaśānanivāsitāya /  namo mātṛgaṇasahitāya /  namo bhagavate tathāgatakulasya /  namo bhagavate padmakulasya /  namo bhagavate vajrakulasya /  namo bhagavate maṇikulasya /  namo bhagavate gajakulasya /
